alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 2:34PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Beaver Dam Wash in Southwestern Washington County in southwestern Utah * WHEN...Until 830 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Beaver Dam Wash and nearby tributaries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Heavy rain remains a possibility through the evening, and further rises are possible.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Dry washes, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
